QuestData.Title: Nobundo Sends Word
QuestData.Description: Your presence has been requested at the Throne of Elements, $n.$b$bVindicator Nobundo has heard the call of the furies upon the wind and made the journey to commune with the elements.$b$bI know not what the intentions of the furies are, but they are revered as noble and powerful spirits by the orcs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Vindicator Nobundo at the Throne of Elements.
